content.rendered:
REAL ESTATE

Our real estate group develops properties for clients throughout the Mid-Atlantic.  With units targeting specific segments like retail or commercial properties, their experience in the industry is unparalleled. And having a separate Property Maintenance division means our properties are always in tip-top shape.

  • Building Materials
  • Construction
  • Real Estate
  • Automotive
  • Other

Simplifying Commercial and Retail Development

Utilizing the construction capabilities and expertise of other business units within the Stewart Companies, our real estate groups deliver a full-service approach to real estate development. We provide everything from site selection and acquisition to sitework, building construction, tenant fit-out, and property management.

APPLE RETAIL PROPERTIES

Focused on the acquisition, development, repositioning and management of upscale community and neighborhood shopping centers in Pennsylvania, Maryland, Virginia and North Carolina.

STEWART PROPERTIES

A real estate development and investment company specializing in land, commercial/industrial, flex, distribution and warehousing properties.
